name: Infallible Instinct
desc: When characters take action, both them and their memosprite gain 1 stack(s) of "Obsession." When memosprites take action, both them and their memomaster gain 1 stack(s) of "Obsession."
enhanced_desc: When characters take action, both them and their memosprite gain 1 stack(s) of "Obsession." When memosprites take action, both them and their memomaster gain 2 stack(s) of "Obsession."
